importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date of the news article, indicating the most recent development in the diplomatic conflict between Colombia and the United States.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The diplomatic spat intensified over a period of two days, culminating in Colombia recalling its ambassador and President Petro’s public response to US actions in the Caribbean.

keyTakeAways: Colombia recalled its ambassador to the United States in response to threats from US President Donald Trump regarding drug trafficking and aid cuts.
President Gustavo Petro of Colombia strongly criticized US actions, including naval strikes on Colombian vessels, calling them violations of sovereignty and international law.
The US administration accused a Colombian vessel of drug trafficking, without providing evidence, and threatened to take over drug enforcement in Colombia.
Colombian Interior Minister Armando Benedetti described US remarks as a threat of invasion or military action, emphasizing the illegality of such actions.
A Colombian fisherman, Alejandro Carranza, was among those killed in a US naval strike, and Petro identified him as a victim of an unjust attack with no drug trafficking ties.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Colombia has recalled its ambassador to the United States in response to threats from former President Donald Trump, who accused Colombian President Gustavo Petro of being an 'illegal drug leader' and threatened to cut off aid and take over drug enforcement in Colombia. The conflict escalated after US naval strikes on a Colombian vessel, allegedly linked to drug trafficking, without providing evidence. Colombian officials, including Interior Minister Armando Benedetti, condemned the strikes as violations of sovereignty and acts of potential military invasion, emphasizing the killing of a civilian fisherman, Alejandro Carranza, who had no ties to drug trafficking. This diplomatic spat highlights growing tensions between Colombia and the US over drug policy, sovereignty, and the legality of military actions in international waters.
title: Colombia recalls ambassador to United States amid diplomatic spat
